question: Question_01_(a)
statement:
\textbf{Short-Answer Questions.} \emph{Put your answer in the box
provided but show your work also. Full marks will be given for correct
answers placed in the bo, but at most one mark will be given for
incorrect answers. Simplify your answer as much as possible.}

Evaluate

$\int(x^{2}+e^{2x})\, dx$
